title: 17th April 1492: Christopher Columbus given funding by Spain to explore across the Atlantic
itunes:summary: On the 17th April 1492, the Catholic Monarchs of Spain – Queen Isabella and King Ferdinand – signed an agreement to support Christopher Columbus’ voyage in which he crossed the Atlantic and discovered the ...
